snippet.title: Zombiewood - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Take the reins of a stuntman turned Hollywood action hero in this hilarious dual-stick shooter with non-stop zombie action and survival gameplay. Available for FREE October 25th on iPhone, iPad and Android!

Like the official Zombiewood page on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Zombiewood

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com 
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter 
Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft 
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog
